blogPost.excerpt: Onsite.fun is the perfect solution for companies to create and maintain camaraderie when working on a distributed basis. We developed group budgeting, centralized invoicing, recurrent activity bundles, and roles to make it seamless and efficient.
blogPost.body: Onsite.fun is the perfect solution for companies to create and maintain camaraderie when working on a distributed basis. We developed group budgeting, centralized invoicing, recurrent activity bundles, and roles to make it seamless and efficient.
blogPost.title: Onsite.fun - Build the connection that powers great teams
blogPost.author: Jaume Alavedra

localize.description: Onsite.fun是一个完美的解决方案，当公司在分布式工作时，可以创造和保持友谊。我们开发了团体预算、集中开票、经常性活动捆绑和角色，使其无缝和高效。
localize.tagline: 建立连接，为伟大的团队提供动力

localize.description: Onsite.fun是一個完美的解決方案，當公司在分佈式工作時，可以創造和保持友誼。我們開發了團體預算、集中開票、經常性活動捆綁和角色，使其無縫和高效。
localize.tagline: 建立連接，爲偉大的團隊提供動力

previous.excerpt: B.E.P. or Backendless Ecommerce Platform turns any website into a shop with just 1-line of code, no backend or CMS required. Plus, it's free, minus standard processing fees (2.9% + $0.30, per transaction).
previous.title: B.E.P. - Launch a shop with 1-line of code, no CMS required

localize.description: B.E.P.或Backendless Ecommerce Platform将任何网站变成商店，只需1行代码，无需后台或CMS。此外，它是免费的，减去标准的处理费用（2.9%+0.30美元，每笔交易）。
localize.tagline: 只需1行代码就能开店，不需要任何内容管理系统

localize.description: B.E.P.或Backendless Ecommerce Platform將任何網站變成商店，只需1行代碼，無需後臺或CMS。此外，它是免費的，減去標準的處理費用（2.9%+0.30美元，每筆交易）。
localize.tagline: 只需1行代碼就能開店，不需要任何內容管理系統

next.excerpt: Have you seen that people are starting to change their profile picture in Clubhouse saying that they are in radio mode or listening? That is exactly what Clubhouse Tools does. It is a web app where you can set up your status through your profile picture.
next.title: Clubhouse Tools - Set up your Clubhouse status

localize.description: 你有没有看到，有人开始在会所里修改自己的资料图片，说自己是在广播模式或者是在收听？这正是Clubhouse工具的作用。它是一个网络应用，你可以通过你的个人资料图片来设置你的状态。
你有沒有看到，有人開始在會所裏修改自己的資料圖片，說自己是在廣播模式或者是在收聽？這正是Clubhouse工具的作用。它是一個網絡應用，你可以通過你的個人資料圖片來設置你的狀態。
